articles.title: Dinosaur Skeleton Found In Portugal Man's Backyard Could Be Europe's Largest Ever Find: Report - NDTV
articles.description: The remains of what could be the largest dinosaur ever found in Europe have been uncovered in man's back garden in Portugal.
articles.content:
The remains are believed to belong to a sauropod dinosaur.
